alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kingfisher (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 7:24PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Kingfisher and southwestern Garfield Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 724 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Hennessey to 3 miles north of Dover to 7 miles northwest of Cashion. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hennessey, Dover, and Lacey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
